body_html:
I intend to build on windows. However, I develop on Mac OS. So ideally I hope to cmake it on Mac.

I have found MSBuild (configured with cmake) to be very slow on windows. Usually taking 10+ minutes for a minimal file change.

body:
I intend to build on windows. However, I develop on Mac OS. So ideally I hope to cmake it on Mac. 

I have found MSBuild (configured with cmake) to be very slow on windows. Usually taking 10+ minutes for a minimal file change.
